name: CD Nutritional Facts
author: Channel Digital

sections.description:
Nutrition labelling regulations have been designed to provide a system for conveying information about the nutrient content of food in a standardized format, which allows for comparison among foods at the point of purchase. Clear, uniform information should support consumers in making informed food choices toward healthy eating goals.

Nutrition information enables dietary management of chronic diseases of public health significance, and to help them make food choices that may reduce the risk of developing chronic diseases.

This plugin presents the information in an America style Nutritional label, ether in the WooCommerce product body or on a seperate description tab.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin CD-Nutritional-Plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or by using the plugin uploader.
  2. Activate the CD-Nutritional-Plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. This will provide a new tab on your WooCommerce product page backend to enter in the nutritonal info.

short_description: Inserts a Nutrition Facts type label to WooCommerce products
